title.zh: 线上：EHC血友病女性科普宣传册中文翻译发布
title.en: Online: Chinese Translation of EHC Hemophilia Women's Educational Brochure Released

description.zh: 今年6月，欧洲血友病联盟（European Haemophilia Consortium，EHC）发布了《Is haemophilia (fe)male? a booklet on women and girls with haemophilia and female haemophilia carriers》科普宣传册。7月，南昌市血之友协会志愿者向EHC发送邮件请求授权翻译，EHC表示支持。在协会成员左钰洁、姚婷耀、万嘉瑞、左国良的努力下，译制了高质量的中文版本《《血友病 是他（她）的吗？关于女性血友病患者与女性携带者的小册子》》。EHC Academy发布中译本进行推广。
description.en: In June this year, the European Haemophilia Consortium (EHC) released the educational brochure 'Is haemophilia (fe)male? a booklet on women and girls with haemophilia and female haemophilia carriers'. In July, volunteers from Nanchang Hemophilia Association sent an email to EHC requesting translation authorization, and EHC expressed support. Through the efforts of association members Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, Yao Tingyao, Wan Jiarui, and Zuo Guoliang, a high-quality Chinese version was produced. EHC Academy published the Chinese translation for promotion.
